name: Multiple Record Selection Modes - DevExtreme Data Grid
description: The DataGrid widget offers two row selection modes. In this example, multiple row selection mode is used. You can specify whether records from all pages or a single one should be selected on clicking the check box within the grid’s column header. For this purpose, use the Select All Mode drop-down menu. To specify in which case check boxes should be visible, use the Show Checkboxes Mode one.
